name: [Phase 1] Strategic Challenge Engine
description:
Phase 1 of the Maxicomm CSO toolkit: an AI-powered engine that helps media and 
adtech teams turn unstructured client inputs (notes, briefings, PDFs, decks) 
into a sharp strategic challenge.

The app:
• Ingests raw context and optional files from newbiz, upsell or cross-sell opportunities.  
• Formulates two alternative challenge statements (A/B) focused on digital media & adtech.  
• Builds a Rumelt-style kernel: diagnosis, guiding policy, cultural tension, market 
  opportunity, consumer insight, behavioural justification, key assumptions and mental models.  
• Delivers three strategic readings (challenger, consultive, mixed) to guide the team 
  before moving to tactical planning.

Designed as the mandatory first step in any new business, upsell or cross-sell process 
for LLYC/Apache media and adtech teams.
